comment.author: 50600163@N07
comment._content: This could well have been me - but it's someone else.  My hair was the same style - but my eyelashes were not so thick - false ones?  I remember this girl, but don't remember her name - tempus fugit!!

comment.author: 50600163@N07
comment._content: Back to this one again - I used to go up to the Shaw Library and read, just like this girl!  it really takes me back. It was a haven of peace in the School where life was often rather frantic in the 60s.

comment.author: 61679995@N04
comment._content: This was Sheila Kelleher, now Professor Emeritus (Queen Mary Medical) Sheila Hillier
